LegendaryMagicItems.Name: Apparatus of Kwalish
LegendaryMagicItems.Description: This complex contraption allows underwater exploration and mobility.

LegendaryMagicItems.Name: Armor, +1, +2, or +3
LegendaryMagicItems.Description: This magical armor provides enhanced protection and durability.

LegendaryMagicItems.Name: Armor of Invulnerability
LegendaryMagicItems.Description: This armor grants its wearer near-invulnerability to most forms of damage.

LegendaryMagicItems.Name: Azuredge
LegendaryMagicItems.Description: This sword can dispel magic and strike true against spellcasters.

LegendaryMagicItems.Name: Belashyrra's Beholder Crown
LegendaryMagicItems.Description: This crown grants the wearer Beholder-like eye beams and vision.

LegendaryMagicItems.Name: Belt of Giant Strength
LegendaryMagicItems.Description: This belt enhances the wearer's strength to giant-like levels.

LegendaryMagicItems.Name: Blackrazor
LegendaryMagicItems.Description: This sentient sword hungers for souls and grants its wielder dark powers.

LegendaryMagicItems.Name: Blackstaff
LegendaryMagicItems.Description: This staff is a symbol of authority and mastery over magic.

LegendaryMagicItems.Name: Blood Fury Tattoo
LegendaryMagicItems.Description: This tattoo grants the user the power of blood magic.

LegendaryMagicItems.Name: Bookmark
LegendaryMagicItems.Description: This magical bookmark can turn into a weapon and strike foes.

LegendaryMagicItems.Name: Cloak of Invisibility
LegendaryMagicItems.Description: This cloak can render its wearer invisible at will.

LegendaryMagicItems.Name: Crystal Ball
LegendaryMagicItems.Description: This crystal ball allows scrying and communication with other locations.

LegendaryMagicItems.Name: Cubic Gate
LegendaryMagicItems.Description: This magical cube can open gateways to other planes of existence.

LegendaryMagicItems.Name: Danoth's Visor
LegendaryMagicItems.Description: This visor grants the user enhanced vision and insight.

LegendaryMagicItems.Name: Dawnbringer
LegendaryMagicItems.Description: This radiant sword is a weapon against darkness and undead.

LegendaryMagicItems.Name: Deck of Many Things
LegendaryMagicItems.Description: This deck can alter fate and grant great boons or curses to the user.

LegendaryMagicItems.Name: Deck of Several Things
LegendaryMagicItems.Description: This deck contains several cards with unpredictable effects.

LegendaryMagicItems.Name: Defender
LegendaryMagicItems.Description: This magical weapon can create barriers and protect its wielder.

LegendaryMagicItems.Name: Dragon Mask
LegendaryMagicItems.Description: This mask grants the user draconic powers and abilities.

LegendaryMagicItems.Name: Dragon Vessel
LegendaryMagicItems.Description: This vessel can summon and control dragons.

LegendaryMagicItems.Name: Dragonlance
LegendaryMagicItems.Description: This lance is a potent weapon against dragons and their kin.

LegendaryMagicItems.Name: Dragon's Wrath Weapon

LegendaryMagicItems.Name: Dragonstaff of Ahghairon
LegendaryMagicItems.Description: This staff holds the power of dragons and can control dragonkind.

LegendaryMagicItems.Name: Dragon-Touched Focus
LegendaryMagicItems.Description: This focus enhances spells and abilities against dragons.

LegendaryMagicItems.Name: Drown
LegendaryMagicItems.Description: This weapon is forged from the heart of a drowned god and can control water.

LegendaryMagicItems.Name: Efreeti Chain
LegendaryMagicItems.Description: This chainmail is infused with the power of efreeti and grants fire-based abilities.

LegendaryMagicItems.Name: Fane-Eater

LegendaryMagicItems.Name: Flail of Tiamat
LegendaryMagicItems.Description: This flail is a symbol of the Dragon Queen and can channel her power.

LegendaryMagicItems.Name: Gloves of Soul Catching
LegendaryMagicItems.Description: These gloves can capture and manipulate the souls of the dead.

LegendaryMagicItems.Name: Grimoire Infinitus
LegendaryMagicItems.Description: This infinite spellbook contains countless spells and magical knowledge.

LegendaryMagicItems.Name: Gurt's Greataxe
LegendaryMagicItems.Description: This massive greataxe deals devastating damage in battle.

LegendaryMagicItems.Name: Hammer of Thunderbolts
LegendaryMagicItems.Description: This hammer can be used to awaken and wield great strength.

LegendaryMagicItems.Name: Hammock of Worlds
LegendaryMagicItems.Description: This magical hammock can create pocket dimensions and alternate worlds.

LegendaryMagicItems.Name: Hazirawn
LegendaryMagicItems.Description: This sentient sword hungers for souls and grants its wielder dark powers.

LegendaryMagicItems.Name: Hide of the Feral Guardian
LegendaryMagicItems.Description: This hide armor transforms its wearer into a feral guardian.

LegendaryMagicItems.Name: Holy Avenger
LegendaryMagicItems.Description: This sword is a powerful weapon against evil and undead creatures.

LegendaryMagicItems.Name: Holy Symbol of Ravenkind
LegendaryMagicItems.Description: This holy symbol has the power to banish vampires and undead.

LegendaryMagicItems.Name: Horn of Valhalla

LegendaryMagicItems.Name: Icon of Ravenloft
LegendaryMagicItems.Description: This icon can be used to confront the Lord of Darkness in Ravenloft.

LegendaryMagicItems.Name: Infernal Tack

LegendaryMagicItems.Name: Infiltrator's Key
LegendaryMagicItems.Description: This key can unlock hidden doors and reveal secret passages.

LegendaryMagicItems.Name: Instrument of the Bards
LegendaryMagicItems.Description: This magical instrument enhances bardic abilities and performances.

LegendaryMagicItems.Name: Ioun Stone

LegendaryMagicItems.Name: Iron Flask
LegendaryMagicItems.Description: This flask can contain and control powerful extraplanar beings.

LegendaryMagicItems.Name: Ironfang
LegendaryMagicItems.Description: This sentient sword hungers for conflict and grants its wielder martial prowess.

LegendaryMagicItems.Name: Jewel of Three Prayers

LegendaryMagicItems.Name: Korolnor Scepter
LegendaryMagicItems.Description: This scepter has the power to control and command elementals.

LegendaryMagicItems.Name: Lost Crown of Besilmer
LegendaryMagicItems.Description: This crown holds the power of an ancient dwarven kingdom and can control stone.

LegendaryMagicItems.Name: Luck Blade
LegendaryMagicItems.Description: This blade has the power to grant wishes and good fortune to its wielder.

LegendaryMagicItems.Name: Luxon Beacon
LegendaryMagicItems.Description: This beacon can manipulate gravity and alter the flow of time.

LegendaryMagicItems.Name: Matalotok
LegendaryMagicItems.Description: This massive war maul deals devastating damage and can control earth.

LegendaryMagicItems.Name: Moonblade
LegendaryMagicItems.Description: This elven sword is a defender against evil and can reveal its true nature.

LegendaryMagicItems.Name: Murgaxor's Orb
LegendaryMagicItems.Description: This orb can manipulate time and alter the fate of individuals.

LegendaryMagicItems.Name: Nepenthe
LegendaryMagicItems.Description: This sword can consume pain and suffering, granting the user strength.

LegendaryMagicItems.Name: Nether Scroll of Azumar
LegendaryMagicItems.Description: This scroll contains forbidden and powerful spells of the Netheril Empire.

LegendaryMagicItems.Name: Nightfall Pearl
LegendaryMagicItems.Description: This pearl can create areas of eternal darkness and shadow.

LegendaryMagicItems.Name: Obsidian Flint Dragon Plate
LegendaryMagicItems.Description: This dragonplate armor is made from the scales of a flint dragon.

LegendaryMagicItems.Name: Orcsplitter

LegendaryMagicItems.Name: Plate Armor of Etherealness
LegendaryMagicItems.Description: This plate armor allows the wearer to phase through solid objects.

LegendaryMagicItems.Name: Platinum Scarf
LegendaryMagicItems.Description: This scarf enhances the user's charisma and social skills.

LegendaryMagicItems.Name: Potion of Dragon's Majesty
LegendaryMagicItems.Description: This potion grants the user draconic abilities and presence.

LegendaryMagicItems.Name: Potion of Giant Size
LegendaryMagicItems.Description: This potion temporarily increases the user's size and strength to giant-like proportions.

LegendaryMagicItems.Name: Potion of Giant Strength
LegendaryMagicItems.Description: This potion enhances the user's strength to giant-like levels.

LegendaryMagicItems.Name: Powered Armor
LegendaryMagicItems.Description: This magical armor enhances the wearer's physical abilities and grants flight.

LegendaryMagicItems.Name: Pyxis of Pandemonium
LegendaryMagicItems.Description: This box can release chaotic and unpredictable creatures when opened.

LegendaryMagicItems.Name: Rakdos Riteknife
LegendaryMagicItems.Description: This knife is a tool of sacrifice and chaos, allowing the user to gain power from pain.

LegendaryMagicItems.Name: Ring of Djinni Summoning
LegendaryMagicItems.Description: This ring can summon and command powerful djinni servants.

LegendaryMagicItems.Name: Ring of Elemental Command
LegendaryMagicItems.Description: This ring grants control over one of the elemental planes and its associated powers.

LegendaryMagicItems.Name: Ring of Invisibility
LegendaryMagicItems.Description: This ring can render its wearer invisible at will.

LegendaryMagicItems.Name: Ring of Spell Turning
LegendaryMagicItems.Description: This ring can reflect spells back at their casters, protecting the wearer.

LegendaryMagicItems.Name: Ring of Three Wishes
LegendaryMagicItems.Description: This ring has the power to grant three wishes to the user.

LegendaryMagicItems.Name: Robe of the Archmagi
LegendaryMagicItems.Description: This robe enhances the user's magical abilities and protects against spells.

LegendaryMagicItems.Name: Rod of Lordly Might
LegendaryMagicItems.Description: This rod has multiple functions, including combat and utility abilities.

LegendaryMagicItems.Name: Rod of Resurrection
LegendaryMagicItems.Description: This rod can bring the dead back to life, but with certain limitations.

LegendaryMagicItems.Name: Ruby Weave Gem
LegendaryMagicItems.Description: This gem can store spells and release them at the user's command.

LegendaryMagicItems.Name: Ruinblade
LegendaryMagicItems.Description: This sword is a weapon of destruction, capable of causing cataclysmic events.

LegendaryMagicItems.Name: Scaled Ornament
LegendaryMagicItems.Description: This ornament grants the user the resilience of dragons and their scales.

LegendaryMagicItems.Name: Scarab of Protection
LegendaryMagicItems.Description: This scarab protects its wearer from a variety of threats and dangers.

LegendaryMagicItems.Name: Scroll of Tarrasque Summoning
LegendaryMagicItems.Description: This scroll can summon the legendary Tarrasque, a monstrous force of destruction.

LegendaryMagicItems.Name: Scroll of the Comet
LegendaryMagicItems.Description: This scroll can call forth a destructive comet to strike down enemies.

LegendaryMagicItems.Name: Shard Solitaire
LegendaryMagicItems.Description: This solitaire grants the user the ability to manipulate shards of reality.

LegendaryMagicItems.Name: Shield of the Hidden Lord
LegendaryMagicItems.Description: This shield contains the essence of a powerful devil and grants infernal powers.

LegendaryMagicItems.Name: Snicker-Snack
LegendaryMagicItems.Description: This vorpal sword can decapitate foes with a single stroke.

LegendaryMagicItems.Name: Sovereign Glue
LegendaryMagicItems.Description: This adhesive is nearly impossible to break or dissolve.

LegendaryMagicItems.Name: Spell Bottle
LegendaryMagicItems.Description: This bottle can store and release spells when uncorked.

LegendaryMagicItems.Name: Spell Gem
LegendaryMagicItems.Description: This gem can store spells and allow the user to cast them.

LegendaryMagicItems.Name: Spell Scroll
LegendaryMagicItems.Description: This scroll contains a single spell that can be cast when read.

LegendaryMagicItems.Name: Sphere Of Annihilation
LegendaryMagicItems.Description: This sphere can annihilate matter and poses a great danger to all it touches.

LegendaryMagicItems.Name: Staff of the Magi
LegendaryMagicItems.Description: This staff is a powerful tool for spellcasters, with numerous magical abilities.

LegendaryMagicItems.Name: Stormgirdle
LegendaryMagicItems.Description: This belt can control weather and harness the power of storms.

LegendaryMagicItems.Name: Sunsword
LegendaryMagicItems.Description: This radiant sword is a weapon against darkness and undead.

LegendaryMagicItems.Name: Sword of Answering
LegendaryMagicItems.Description: This sword can counter the attacks of enemies and strike true.

LegendaryMagicItems.Name: Talarith
LegendaryMagicItems.Description: This item has a variety of useful abilities, including summoning allies.

LegendaryMagicItems.Name: Talisman of Pure Good
LegendaryMagicItems.Description: This talisman is a powerful weapon against evil creatures and demons.

LegendaryMagicItems.Name: Talisman of the Sphere
LegendaryMagicItems.Description: This talisman can manipulate and control the forces of the elemental planes.

LegendaryMagicItems.Name: Talisman of Ultimate Evil
LegendaryMagicItems.Description: This talisman is a powerful weapon against good-aligned creatures and celestial beings.

LegendaryMagicItems.Name: Tinderstrike
LegendaryMagicItems.Description: This sword can create and manipulate fire, making it a deadly weapon.

LegendaryMagicItems.Name: Tome of the Stilled Tongue
LegendaryMagicItems.Description: This tome contains ancient and silenced spells, granting the user unique powers.

LegendaryMagicItems.Name: Topaz Annihilator
LegendaryMagicItems.Description: This mace can unleash destructive forces and annihilate enemies.

LegendaryMagicItems.Name: Universal Solvent
LegendaryMagicItems.Description: This solvent can dissolve almost any substance or magical effect.

LegendaryMagicItems.Name: Verminshroud
LegendaryMagicItems.Description: This shroud grants the user control over vermin and insects.

LegendaryMagicItems.Name: Vorpal Sword
LegendaryMagicItems.Description: This sword can decapitate foes with a single stroke.

LegendaryMagicItems.Name: Wave
LegendaryMagicItems.Description: This trident has control over water and the power to create tidal waves.

LegendaryMagicItems.Name: Waythe
LegendaryMagicItems.Description: This scythe can slice through the barriers between life and death.

LegendaryMagicItems.Name: Well of Many Worlds
LegendaryMagicItems.Description: This well can create gateways to other planes of existence.

LegendaryMagicItems.Name: Whelm
LegendaryMagicItems.Description: This sentient warhammer can control and manipulate water.

LegendaryMagicItems.Name: Windvane
LegendaryMagicItems.Description: This weapon can harness the power of air and control winds.

LegendaryMagicItems.Name: Witchlight Vane
LegendaryMagicItems.Description: This vane can detect and track the presence of witches and other supernatural beings.

LegendaryMagicItems.Name: Witchlight Watch
LegendaryMagicItems.Description: This watch grants its wearer protection against curses and hexes.

LegendaryMagicItems.Name: Wreath of the Prism
LegendaryMagicItems.Description: This wreath manipulates and controls the colors and lights of the spectrum.

LegendaryMagicItems.Name: Ythryn Mythallar
